linker
Class Linker

java.lang.Object
  linker.Linker

public class Linker
extends java.lang.Object

 Class Name: Linker
 Description: Links object file and generates output using 2 pass loader.
 
 Version information:
 $RCSfile: Linker.java,v $
 $Revision: 1.49 $
 $Date: 2012/05/30 19:09:27 $

Author:
Zak
